title: [Discussion][Question] Did anyone attend the "Study in Japan and Japanese Movie Matinee" at 3pm.
content: The "**Visit by His Excellency the Consul General of Japan -Â Study in Japan and Japanese Movie Matinee"** which took place at 3pm, I missed it cos I was sick but i wanted to attend, and did the consul general of Japan actually visit? Everyone I asked didn't go ? please tell me what happened or what its about and was it worth it?

comments.body:
Yes he did visit and gave a mini speech ( basic talk), some lady explained 
why u should study in Japan and it's less expensive compared to other countries and you get a visa for 50 inr, told us to look at some websites for scholarships.
Toshiba dude came and talked about something which no one heard ig ( just what it is and all). Then they played movie 
that's all
I see thank you, do you know how many people attended?
It was good and the movie was nice
could you share the websites if you remember? :)
